title: Airtel buys 25% stake in desi tech startup Lavelle Networks for undisclosed sum - Economic Times
content: Airtel buys 25% stake in desi tech startup Lavelle Networks for undisclosed sum  Economic Times
description: Shyamal Kumar, co-founder & CEO, Lavelle Networks, said  the company is “excited that its product and early market success will now be massively accelerated by this transformational partnership with Airtel”.
